tagline: Where I put all the projects I don't work on
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Procrastinology: Source
body:
### Welcome to my Github Page!
I saw that Github is now offering page hosting so I figured it'd be fun to set it up.  I already have a site on Blogger to which I never post so why not add another?

### Why?
I think it's cool that you can publish via git directly.  That's just too cool.
Also, I might use this site for technical/project related posts only and more personal posts will go on my Blogger site.  Or maybe I'll not post to either!  Yeah, that's the ticket..
